statements: DELETE FROM drug_manufacturing_processes WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM drug_manufacturing_processes WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND manufacturing_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM fda_regulations WHERE regulation_id IN (1001, 1002);
DELETE FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE description = 'Outdated process';
DELETE FROM drug_manufacturing WHERE process_id = 100 AND manufacturing_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM storage WHERE storage_id = 500 AND quantity < 10;
